attributes.action: Tax enployers for mileage of employees traveling to and from work
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a solution to both congestion and green issues the government should tax employers for mileage traveled to and from work by employees, the aim being to disuade employers from employing people who live excessive distances from there place of work, this would be a far fairer form of road tolls as it would truly be a decission whether to pay or not and should vastly reduce numbers of vehicles comuting between towns
